title: Biohazard 4 or Resident Evil 4
description:
Minimum System Requirements:

CPU: 	Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 Processor 1.4GHz
RAM: 	256MB
VGA: 	128MB VRAM card with DirectX(R) 9.0c /Shader 2.0 (see supported list*)
DX: 	DirectX(R) 9.0c or higher (included on disc)
OS: 	Microsoft(R)Windows(R)2000/XP
HDD: 	7.0GB of free space required
Sound: 	DirectX(R) 9.0c or higher compatible sound card
Resolution: 	800 x 600 resolution(SVGA), High-Color (16-bit color) or better
ODD: 	4x DVD-ROM or higher

Recommended System Requirements:

CPU:	Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 Processor 2GHz or higher	
RAM:	512MB
VGA:	256MB VRAM card with DirectX(R) 9.0c or higher /Shader 2.0 or higher (see supported list*)	
DX:	DirectX(R) 9.0c or higher (included on disc)
OS: 	Microsoft(R)Windows(R)2000/XP
HDD: 	7.0GB of free space required
Sound:	DirectX(R) 9.0c or higher compatible sound card
Resolution: 	800 x 600 resolution(SVGA), High-Color (16-bit color) or better
ODD: 	4x DVD-ROM or higher

Recommended peripheral:	Mouse and keyboard (required), PC compatible gamepad (4-axis dual analog sticks and 12 or more buttons required)
Note: *Supported Video Cards at Time of Release: -NVIDIAÃ‚Â® GeForce" FX/6/7 families -ATI Radeon 9500-9800/X families (x200 NOT supported) -Laptop versions of chipsets may work but are not supported.
